common

Class TileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.TileManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDrawable, ITileManager

    public class TileManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITileManager
    Holds the tiles of type Tile(2dim array) of sceneryTiles and tilesOverlay drawn on the canvas It also hols the rows and columns of type int
